step1.para: Chock wheels.
Evacuate air conditioning system.
Disconnect battery.
Remove ash tray. Remove ash tray mounting bracket.
Remove upper left hand dash panel.
Remove lower right hand dash panel with air conditioning drain pan attached.
Remove upper right hand dash panel.
Remove relay panel from dash frame. Lay panel aside for access.
Remove cover plate from air conditioning/heater box.
Disconnect feeler bulb and equalizer line from evaporator. Cut insulation as needed.
Disconnect wiring from high and low pressure switches. Remove both switches.
Remove expansion valve from support bracket. Disconnect evaporator line from expansion valve.
Disconnect evaporator line (under air conditioning/heater box) from support bracket.
Remove air cleaner housing assembly, include disconnect air compressor hose.
Disconnect evaporator suction line at engine cowl(engine side).
Remove cover and grommet from evaporator suction line (engine side).

note.para: Mark depth of capillary tube prior to removal. Remove capillary tube from evaporator.

step1.para: Remove screws retaining evaporator. Remove evaporator. Cut insulation as needed.
Install capillary tube, to depth marked, into evaporator.
Install evaporator. Install insulation if removed.
Install grommet and cover to evaporator suction line.
Connect evaporator suction line.
Install air cleaner housing assembly. Connect air compressor hose.
Connect evaporator line to support bracket under air conditioning/heater box.
Connect evaporator line to expansion valve. Install expansion valve to support bracket.
Install high and low pressure switches. Connect wiring to switches.
Connect feeler bulb and equalizer line to evaporator line.
Charge air conditioning. Check for leaks.
Install cover plate to air conditioning/heater box.
Install relay panel.
Install upper right hand dash panel.
Install air conditioning drain pan tube in opening at cowl area. Install lower right hand panel.
Install upper left hand dash panel.
Install ash tray mounting bracket. Install ash tray.
Connect battery.
Remove wheel chocks.
